translations.translation: Who watches you when you get up,
Who observes you when you rise (to pray)
who can see whether you stand up
Who watches you when you stand up.
Who sees you when you stand up.
Who sees you when you stand up.
who sees thee when thou standest
Who seeth thee when thou standest up (to pray)
who sees you when you stand up [for prayer],
Who seeth thee when thou standest up
who sees you when you stand [for prayer],
Who seeth thee standing forth (in prayer),
Who sees you (O Muhammad SAW) when you stand up (alone at night for Tahajjud prayers).
who sees you when you stand
He Who sees you when you rise.
Who sees you when you arise
[26:218] Who sees you when you stand, for prayer,
(Who seeth thee when thou standest up) in prayer,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وكيف لا يرحمك يا أكمل الرسل، ولا يكفيك مؤونة أعدائك { ٱلَّذِي يَرَاكَ } أي: القيوم القادر الذي يشاهد { حِينَ تَقُومُ } [الشعراء: 218] من منامك خلال الليل طلباً لمرضاته، ورفعاً لحاجاتك نحوه؟!
